title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Basic properties of water; Determination of hydrostatic forces; Kinematics of flow; Potential flow; Continuity, Energy and Momentum principles; Open channel flow; Uniform and gradually varied flows; Dimensional analysis; Hydraulic similitude and Modelling; Flow in pipes and Pipe networks; Hydraulics machines; Pumps and Turbines.
